the people.translation[0].definitions[0]: all the ordinary people in a country or a state, not the government or ruling class
Rice formed the staple food of the common people.
The party try to portray the prime minister as a man of the people (=someone in power who understands or is like ordinary people).
the people.translation[0].definitions[1]: used in court cases to represent the government of the US or of a particular state
